alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Transylvania (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 27 at 11:48AM EDT until May 29 at 11:40PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for French Broad River At Blantyre... ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...French Broad River At Blantyre. * WHEN...Until late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...By 17.0 feet, Floodwaters will continue to inundate farmland between the French Broad River and the railroad tracks and may start to inundate the shoulders of River Road near the Big Willow Road intersection. Floodwaters continue to impact boat access areas at Grove Bridge Rd. and Crab Creek Rd. At 18.0 feet, The river may overtop the railroad tracks near Fodderstack Mountain Rd. and River Ridge Rd. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM EDT Friday the stage was 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.5 feet tomorrow. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. For detailed information including observed and forecast stages, flood impacts, flood history, FEMA Flood Hazard Layers, and more, please visit: https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=gsp
